item.description:
---- I am thinking that we should POSTPONE this meetup for this weekend, since Irene seems to be heading this way to make her grand entrance-----

 

Hey Ladies! I saw the brunch idea and thought Johnny D's. They have a live band playing but I would suggest about 19 being the maximum due to seating. We can always plan to go there again! Their prices are good and so is the food! Johnny D's is located in Cambridge, Davis Sq. Hope you like the idea!
item.name: Sunday Jazz Brunch @ Johnny D's
